thread.title: Seven Stars Cloud to Report Q4 and Full Year 2017 Results and Host Earnings Release Call Friday, March 30

author: cnbc.com
title: Seven Stars Cloud to Report Q4 and Full Year 2017 Results and Host Earnings Release Call Friday, March 30

organizations.name: about seven stars cloud group, inc.

text:
NEW YORK, March 19, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Seven Stars Cloud Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: SSC) ("SSC" or the "Company"), announced today that it will report its financial results for the fourth quarter and full year ending 12/31/2017, on March 30, 2018.
SSC's management, including Bruno Wu (Executive Chairman & CEO), Robert G. Benya (President, Director & Chief Revenue Officer), Simon Wang (CFO) and Jason Wu (Finance Director), will host an earnings release conference call at 8:00 a.m. on Friday, March 30, 2018, U.S. Eastern Time (8:00 p.m. on Friday, Beijing/Hong Kong Time).
Webcast Link: via 'Events & Presentation' section of SSC's corporate website or http://sevenstarscloud.equisolvewebcast.com/q4-2017 (link will be active closer to actual earnings release date)
Dial-in Number: (Toll-Free US & Canada): 877-407-3107; (International): 201-493-6796
SSC management encourages investors to email their questions in advance of the webcast/call and time permitting, management will answer submitted questions. Please email ir@sevenstarscloud.com .
About Seven Stars Cloud Group, Inc. ( http://www.sevenstarscloud.com/ )
SSC is aiming to become a next generation Artificial-Intelligent (AI) & Blockchain-Powered, Fintech company. By managing and providing an infrastructure and environment that facilitates the transformation of traditional financial markets such as commodities, currency and credit into the asset digitization era, SSC provides asset owners and holders a seamless method and platform for digital asset securitization and digital currency tokenization and trading.
